title: EC, Nipper and Aku
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Episode of Series "Lift off". Nipper and Aku are great friends. They share a world of fun and imagination, and they share EC as well! 'Cherry Pie' - Nipper, Aku, Paul and Poss visit Grandma's and Grandpa's farm. They go on a treasure hunt and are treated to Grandpa's cherry pie. 'Aku and the Dinosaur' - Aku pretends to be a dinosaur, but she upsets her friends when she goes too far. 'EC belongs to everybody' - Nipper locks EC away and won't let Aku play with the doll. But when he finds out that he's left out of everything, he shares EC again. 'Aliens above' - When Aku and Nipper hear strange noises from upstairs, they decide an alien lives there. The older kids don't believe it, so the two of them go to find out the truth.
